translation.de: Was haben Sie wohl falsch gemacht?

translation.en: Ever wonder what it feels like to be tall enough to ride a rollercoaster?
translation.de: Sie sind nicht mal groß genug, um Achterbahn zu fahren.

translation.en: That's Countess Sekou.
She's Vik's ex-fiancée, and she's Claudette's old university roommate.
translation.de: Sie ist Viks Ex-Verlobte und Claudettes frühere Uni-Zimmergenossin.

translation.en: And they're still friends? She's quite rude, by the way.
translation.de: Sie sind noch befreundet? Sie ist ziemlich unhöflich.

translation.en: Well, on top of all that, she's also Claudette's maid of honor.
-[Audrey] What? -Yeah.
[man over PA] Hope you watched the video because the dancing is about to begin!
translation.de: Ich hoffe, ihr habt das Lehrvideo gesehen, denn der Tanz beginnt!

translation.en: -What dancing? -I'm gonna fake going to the bathroom.
-I don't dance. You dance. -I didn't get a video. Did you?
They brought one to the room. -I forgot to tell you. -Thanks.
translation.de: -Ich habe vergessen, es dir zu zeigen. -Danke.

translation.en: [man over PA] Ladies and gentlemen, please help me welcome the bride!
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren, wir heißen die Braut willkommen!

translation.en: Come with us!
All right, come on!
-Come on, baby! -[screams]
[over PA] And now it's time!
The moment you've all been waiting for.
translation.de: Der Moment, den Sie erwartet haben.

translation.en: The groom, Vikram Govindan!
This is crazy!
Brother!
Back! Get everybody back! Get everybody back!
[guard] Stay back!
-[Nick] Okay, all right. -[Claudette shrieks]
[Claudette] Is he dead?
It's not him. It's not Vik.
Oh, thank God! It's only Mr. Lou.
translation.de: Gott, es ist nur Mr. Lou.

translation.en: -Who did this to you? -[Claudette] Where is Vik? Hey!
translation.de: -Wer war das? -Wo ist Vik? Hey! Wer? Was?

translation.en: [Audrey] Who? What? Oh my gosh!
translation.de: Hey! Wer? Was? -Oh mein Gott! -Wo ist Vik?

translation.en: Where is Vik?
-Who did this to you? -Who was it? Do you remember?
It was…
[Nick] Say it. Say it. Don't die. Don't die!
-[Audrey] Oh my gosh! -[Claudette] Where is Vik?
[guard 1] Clear! Clear! Come on!
-Come on! Come on! Come on! Go! -[guard 2] Clear!
-[Nick] This is a distraction. -[Audrey] From what?
From the escape!
-[Colonel] Are you serious? -[shutter clicks] What do you mean all communication systems are down?
translation.de: Im Ernst? Alle Kommunikationssysteme fielen aus?

translation.en: Get them up and running!
We have a security officer compromised. We need medical attention immediately.
translation.de: Ein Wachmann ist verletzt. Wir brauchen ärztliche Hilfe.

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
[Vik] Help!
Yo, you hatin’ hard on me right now, son!
-Homeboy! -[Vik] Nick!
[Vik yelling] Nick!
This is some janky-ass shit!
[Colonel] Lock down the island
until the security cameras are back online.
translation.de: bis die Überwachungskameras wieder online sind.

translation.en: All guests are to remain in their rooms.
translation.de: Alle Gäste bleiben in ihren Zimmern!

translation.en: Oh my God. We need to get ahead of this, or our shares will plummet.
translation.de: Gott, wir müssen etwas tun, sonst rutschen unsere Aktien ab.

translation.en: My brother could be dead and the only thing you're concerned about are share prices?
translation.de: Mein Bruder könnte tot sein, und Sie sorgen sich um Aktienkurse?

translation.en: How do you think our investors will react when news of this gets out,
translation.de: Wie werden Investoren reagieren, wenn das rauskommt,

translation.en: you little Miss Minority Shareholder?
Giving all her money to save the whales and heal the planet
translation.de: Sie spenden Geld, um Wale und den Planeten zu retten,

translation.en: and all that nonsense.
Colonel. Where is Vik?
Where is my husband?
[Colonel] We will find him. We will find him.
The Maharajah's been kidnapped.
-What? -[Countess] Oh my God!
-Where did they take him? -[Nick] He's alive.
Somebody with a machine gun threw him on a boat, and they took off.
translation.de: Ein Bewaffneter fuhr mit ihm in einem Boot davon.

translation.en: -How many kidnappers? -[Nick] One.
Which means his partner is still here on the island.
translation.de: Sein Partner ist noch auf der Insel.

translation.en: Hold on. How do you know there were two?
If the kidnapper had Vik and was taking him to the boat…
translation.de: Wenn der Entführer Vik im Schlepptau zum Boot brachte…

translation.en: Ah, someone else was leading the elephant into the tent.
translation.de: Jemand anders führte den Elefanten ins Zelt.

translation.en: -Thank you. -There are 400 people on this island.
That's a lot of suspects. Let us narrow it down for you, okay, Colonel?
translation.de: -Das sind viele Verdächtige. -Wir grenzen sie ein, Colonel.

translation.en: Claudette, how many people knew about the elephant being part of the ceremony? Just the board.
translation.de: -Claudette, wer wusste von dem Elefanten? -Nur der Vorstand.

translation.en: Yeah, we had to sign off at the expense of transporting an elephant.
translation.de: Ja, wir mussten die Elefant-Transportkosten genehmigen.

translation.en: So that means all of you.
What are you implying?
I think it's very obvious what I'm implying.
translation.de: Es ist doch klar, was ich damit meine.

translation.en: -[Nick] Mm-hmm. -One of you is an accomplice to a murder.
-That is ridiculous! -I'm not on the board!
Is it? You all hated my brother!
translation.de: Wirklich? Ihr alle habt meinen Bruder gehasst!

translation.en: What? No, I… I love Vik.
[scoffs] Oh, please!
-You've never forgiven me. -For what?
-Breaking up your engagement. -Oh, get over yourself.
It was an arranged marriage between our families.
translation.de: Es war eine arrangierte Ehe zwischen unseren Familien.

translation.en: We amicably split in order to allow for your so-called "love marriage."
translation.de: Wir trennten uns gütlich, um eure "Liebesheirat" zu ermöglichen.

translation.en: You didn't want this marriage to go through so you kidnapped him!
translation.de: Du bist gegen diese Ehe und hast ihn entführt!

translation.en: You gold-digging--
-Ladies, stop it! -Calm down, everybody!
translation.de: -Du geldgeile… -Meine Damen! Aufhören! Beruhigen Sie sich! Alle!

translation.en: -We do this for a living. It's what we do. -[Nick] It's our thing.
-And this is not just another case. -No.
-[Nick] This is personal. -[Audrey] Yeah, it's Vik.
-[Nick] He means a lot to us. -[Audrey] So we'll find out who did this.
translation.de: -Er bedeutet uns viel. -Wir werden den Täter finden.

translation.en: -[Nick] A hundred percent. -[Audrey] And find out why they did this.
And we're gonna get Vik back, okay?
We're gonna do this for the low, low price of $25 million.
translation.de: Wir tun das für den niedrigen Preis von 25 Millionen Dollar.

translation.en: Twenty-five mil, honey. I swear to God.
[Nick] I would've settled for ten grand. So insane.
What are you doing?
[Nick] I'm blocking the door so no one can get in.
[Audrey] Honey, you're gonna hurt your back.
translation.de: Schatz, du tust dir den Rücken weh.

translation.en: You know what would hurt my back? A knife going through it.
translation.de: Weißt du, was meinem Rücken wehtut? Ein Messer.

translation.en: The killer knows we're on to him.
We're on the next-to-kill list. I guarantee it.
What happened to Vik? A guy that rich gets kidnapped for the money.
translation.de: -Was ist mit Vik? -Reiche werden für Geld entführt.

translation.en: There's no profit in hurting him.
Oh God. We're not gonna be invited anywhere ever again. Ever again.
translation.de: Oh Gott. Man wird uns nie wieder einladen.

translation.en: The cheese has a hold on me, honey. I can't stop.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht von diesem Käse lassen.

translation.en: Are you just… Will you take a slice like a civilized person?
translation.de: Kannst du ihn nicht zivilisiert scheibchenweise essen?

translation.en: I don't know where the knife is.
-Oh Jesus! -[Nick] What? You got a headache?
-Yes! -[Nick] I'm sorry.
-How's your back? -My back's killing me.
-I'll get Advil. -Please. Please.
-I'm gonna get more cheese in me. -Honey, do not eat all that cheese.
translation.de: -Ich esse noch etwas Käse. -Iss nicht so viel Käse.

translation.en: That affects… You're terrible all night. -Absolutely. -Oh.
And I have pictures from the tent of a burned robe with bloodstains.
translation.de: Ich habe im Zelt eine verbrannte Robe mit Blutflecken fotografiert.

translation.en: Someone was trying to get rid of the evidence, and I'm sure it was the elephant handler.
translation.de: Jemand wollte Beweise vernichten. Es war sicher der Elefantenführer.

translation.en: Good detecting, sweetheart.
-I'm doing my best. Here. -[Nick] Okay. Thank you.
-[Audrey] One, two, three, four. -[Nick] Okay.
[Nick] I gotta move this stuff now?
What if that's the killer?
-Killers don't knock. -What if it's housekeeping?
translation.de: -Ist das der Mörder? -Mörder klopfen nicht. Zimmerservice?

translation.en: We… We're good! We don't need any towels.
No! No! We do need towels. Leave 'em out front, please!
translation.de: Doch, brauchen wir. Legen Sie Handtücher hin!

translation.en: We've been here ten minutes. You need more towels?
You use 30 towels after every shower. I'm sorry. At least I shower.
translation.de: -Du nutzt beim Duschen 30 Handtücher. -Wenigstens dusche ich.

translation.en: All right, you got me there.
[Francisco] It's me, Francisco!
Wait, wait, wait. What if he's the killer?
translation.de: Warte. Er könnte der Mörder sein.

translation.en: The only thing he wants to murder is your hm-hm!
translation.de: Wenn er was töten will, dann deine hm-hm.

translation.en: -[Francisco] Hurry! There's no time! -[Nick] Be right there!
-[Audrey] We're hurrying! -[Nick] We know!
So sorry.
-[Nick] Hey. -Hey.
-You. -[Nick] Mm-hmm.
Gorgeous.
[Nick] Jesus Christ. All right.
[Audrey] Put this back. You said hurry.
What's… How can we help?
-I have information. -[Nick] Yes.
Everyone thinks Claudette is this gold digger,
translation.de: Alle denken, Claudette wolle nur Geld.

translation.en: but what's not so well known is the fact that, as a precaution,
translation.de: Aber kaum jemand weiß, dass sie einen brutalen Ehevertrag unterschreiben musste.

translation.en: the board made her sign a brutal prenup.
translation.de: dass sie einen brutalen Ehevertrag unterschreiben musste.

translation.en: So that means if Vik divorces her, she's left with nothin'.
translation.de: Wenn Vik sich von ihr scheiden lässt, kriegt sie also nichts?

translation.en: -I gotta move this shit again? -Wait. Wait. Who is it?
translation.de: -Muss ich den Scheiß wieder wegräumen? -Wer ist da?

translation.en: [Claudette] It's Claudette. You must hear what I have to say.
translation.de: Claudette. Ich muss Ihnen etwas sagen!

translation.en: Okay, one second. Let's get you in the closet.
translation.de: Ok, Moment! Gehen Sie in den Schrank.

translation.en: [Nick] Okay, be right there. I gotta get some cheese.
translation.de: Bin gleich da, ich hol mir nur Käse!

translation.en: -Okay. Just go in there. -[rock scraping floor]
No! Get off of… Jesus!
-Coming, Claudette! -Sorry! One second.
[Nick] Hurry!
-[Audrey] Hello, Claudette. -[Nick] Hi.
[Claudette] They all think I'm marrying Vik just for the money, especially the Countess.
translation.de: Alle denken, ich wolle nur Geld. Vor allem die Countess.

translation.en: She's been jealous of me ever since we met.
-Really? I can imagine why. -I can imagine.
But still, she was my best friend.
translation.de: Dabei war sie meine beste Freundin.

translation.en: -Right. -[Nick] Sure.
-You know? -Yeah.
-We were so close. -[Audrey] Oh!
And I think I just miss her sometimes.
-Oh, sorry. -[Claudette sobbing]
-I just wanna know who kidnapped my Vik. -Mm-hmm.
They all have something to gain from this.
-Terrible. -[Claudette] I can't trust any of them!
-[whispers] There's a gun. -A gun?
[Claudette] The Colonel, so bitter about his demotion.
Saira, always starved for attention.
And Vik had just discovered Francisco's dark secret.
translation.de: Und Vik hatte gerade Franciscos dunkles Geheimnis entdeckt.

translation.en: -[Audrey] What? -[Nick] He had a secret?
-Oh! -[Nick] Oh God.
-[Audrey] We don't need to do that. -[Nick] That's cool.
Who is it?
It's Saira. Let me in.
Uh, okay. One second.
-I need to hide. The closet! -No, no, no!
-[Nick] It's too dark. -Here. Come on.
-[Nick] She has all her stuff. -One second, Saira!
[Nick] Coming! Be right there!
Okay, gotta get to you!
-So sorry. One second. -Moving around some stuff for fun!
-I know who you need to be looking at. -[Nick] Who?
-Claudette! -[Nick] Claudette?
[Saira] I told Vik she was bad news the minute I met her.
translation.de: Ich habe Vik immer vor ihr gewarnt.

translation.en: She's suspicious, narcissistic, manipulative, and looks cheap as well in that red dress--
translation.de: Sie ist zwielichtig, narzisstisch, manipulativ und sieht billig aus.

translation.en: Excuse me! I'm so sorry to interrupt, but I feel like I'd be a rude hostess
translation.de: Entschuldige. Als Gastgeberin möchte ich dir unbedingt ein Stück exquisiten Käse anbieten.

translation.en: if I didn't offer you a piece of this exquisite artisan cheese that's…
translation.de: Als Gastgeberin möchte ich dir unbedingt ein Stück exquisiten Käse anbieten.

translation.en: Nick, where's this… Where's that cheese? The big--
-The cheese is gone. -Where is it?
I put it, uh, in my stomach. You ate that entire block of cheese?
translation.de: -In meinem Bauch. -Du aßt den ganzen Käse?

translation.en: Trying to shame me. I don't know if that's gonna get the cheese back--
translation.de: Mich zu beschämen, bringt den Käse nicht zurück.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't mean to be selfish--
Sorry. Hold on. You know what?
Let me give you a drink right now just to relax you a little bit.
translation.de: Ich gebe dir einen Drink zur Entspannung.

translation.en: -Here. -I… I don't want that.
-No? Okay. -I'm okay.
-Oh shit. -[Saira] Who is it?
-[Audrey] Not sure. -You expecting someone?
It's like an after-party. People just show up.
translation.de: Es ist wie bei einer After-Show-Party.

translation.en: Let's put you into the bedroom, just in case, 'cause I don't know.
translation.de: Geh ins Schlafzimmer, nur für den Fall.

translation.en: -I'll hide there. -Don't hide in there! Why? That's an obvious spot.
translation.de: -Ich geh da rein. -Nein! Viel zu offensichtlich.

translation.en: -[Audrey] Is it hot in here? -I'm hot too.
translation.de: -Ist es heiß hier? -Mir ist auch heiß.

translation.en: -I'm coming! -[knocking continues]
What if that is the killer?
Don't you kinda want it to be the killer so they can kill us?
translation.de: Der Mörder könnte uns wenigstens umbringen.

translation.en: I am sick of this shit.
-Baby, I do not feel very good. -[rock scraping]
translation.de: Schatz, ich fühle mich nicht gut.

translation.en: What's doin'? Yeah?
Hey, great to see you.
What's going on? [chuckles lightly]
[Countess] I know who did it.
Who?
It was Francisco.
Francisco!
He has had over 85 paternity suits filed against him.
translation.de: Er hat über 85 Vaterschaftsklagen am Hals.

translation.en: We suspect he's been siphoning money out of the company
in order to pay for all of these babies he made.
translation.de: um für all seine Kinder zu bezahlen.

translation.en: That's a lie!
Not the part about the babies.
Yes, that's true. I've spread my seed far and wide,
translation.de: Ja, ich habe meinen Samen weit verstreut.

translation.en: but I have never stolen in my life.
translation.de: Aber ich habe noch nie etwas gestohlen!

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -An excellent question.
-What are you all doing here? -Saira's here.
translation.de: -Was macht ihr alle hier? -Saira ist hier.

translation.en: -Nobody move! -Oh my God!
I ain't moving.
It's mine. It's mine.
-I missed it. -[Nick] Missed the call?
I have a message.
[distorted voice] We have the Maharajah.
If you contact the authorities, he dies.
translation.de: Wenn Sie die Behörden kontaktieren, stirbt er.

translation.en: We'll make our demands known to you at 7:00 a.m.
translation.de: Wir stellen unsere Forderungen um 7 Uhr.

translation.en: That voice is hysterical. You got to admit it. So we should all stay here. Correct, Colonel?
translation.de: Die Stimme klingt echt lustig. Wir sollten alle hierbleiben, Colonel?

translation.en: Because one of us is definitely working with the kidnapper.
translation.de: Weil einer von uns mit dem Entführer arbeitet.

translation.en: Yeah. Motives, opportunities.
Somebody here.
My head is spinning a little bit. Honey?
Babe, are you taking a nap? I'm tired, too, so let's, uh…
translation.de: Machst du ein Nickerchen? Ich bin auch müde. Also lasst uns…

translation.en: Nobody leave here until we figure out who did what.
translation.de: Niemand reist ab, bevor alles geklärt ist.

translation.en: It's great to see everybody. -Thanks for coming over. Sorry, my bad. -[Francisco] Whoa!
translation.de: Es war mir eine Freude, danke fürs Kommen.

translation.en: [yelps] Jesus! What?
Oh my God. Nick?
-[Nick] Yeah. -Nick?
[Nick] Yeah?
-[Audrey] Nick! -Uh-huh.
Nicky, honey. Get up. Get up! We got roofied.
translation.de: Steh auf. Jemand verpasste uns K.-o.-Tropfen.

translation.en: -What happened? -[Audrey] Baby. Oh my God! We fell asleep!
-[Nick] Oh yeah? -Honey! [Nick] We're sleeping now.
I don't know what happened. Uh, I…
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was passiert ist.

translation.en: -Come on! Get up, Nick! -[Nick] Okay. Up. I'm up.
[Audrey] Who did this?
[Nick] What? Now they're just showing off.
translation.de: -Wer war das? -Was? Das ist jetzt Angeberei.

translation.en: -[Audrey] Hurry up! -[Nick] Okay, I'm coming, honey. So…
-[Audrey] Get up! -[Nick] I'm up!
-Calm down before you say anything. -Nobody drugs us and gets away with it!
-Maybe they didn't drug us. -It's illegal!
Maybe we just ate too much.
translation.de: Haben wir einfach zu viel gegessen?

translation.en: -That's why we passed out. -Nick. Audrey. Just in time.
translation.de: Haben wir einfach zu viel gegessen? Nick und Audrey. Gerade rechtzeitig.

translation.en: -For what? -For what?
The real detectives have just arrived.
[Colonel] Connor Miller.
-[Audrey gasps] -Former MI6 hostage negotiator.
Oh my God. Specializes in high-profile cases.
translation.de: Gott, er ist Spezialist für hochkarätige Fälle.

translation.en: He got the President of Uruguay's son back from the cartel.
translation.de: Er rettete den Präsidentensohn in Uruguay.

translation.en: -He wrote the book. He wrote the book. -On what?
How Rogaine doesn't work for everybody? The book! Our course detective book!
[Miller] Greetings. I hear you need a case solved.
translation.de: Guten Tag. Es gibt einen Fall zu lösen?

translation.en: Colonel. Been a long time.
Francisco Perez.
Big fan.
Mr. Miller, we're also very big fans. Um, we can bring you up to speed.
translation.de: Wir sind Fans von Ihnen. Hier ist der neuste Stand:

translation.en: So what we know already is that this is at least a two-person job.
I saw the first guy escape with Vik on a boat, leaving the second guy still on the island.
translation.de: Einer entkam mit Vik in einem Boot, der zweite ist noch auf der Insel.

translation.en: Also, just so you know, we were both drugged last night.
translation.de: Zudem wurden wir beide gestern Abend betäubt.

translation.en: I don't know if we were drugged. We did have a few drinks--
translation.de: Nicht sicher. Wir hatten ein paar Drinks.

translation.en: -You must be the Spitzes. -Yes.
Yes, we are!
Your reputations precede you.
-There you go. -Why, thank you.
-That's nice to hear. -Uh, not in a positive way, I'm afraid.
translation.de: -Das hören wir gern. -Danke. Kein guter Ruf, fürchte ich.

translation.en: Okay.
I understand the last time you were involved in something like this,
translation.de: Als Sie zuletzt in so etwas verwickelt waren,

translation.en: everybody died?
Well, that was not the Maharajah.
How's he doing now?
-[laughs] Okay. -Right.
The Colonel's still here, most of him, so there. That's good.
translation.de: Der Colonel ist noch größtenteils da.

translation.en: Um, listen. Mr. Miller, I read your book, and--
translation.de: Mr. Miller, ich habe Ihr Buch gelesen.

translation.en: [Miller] Colonel, I wanna see all the security footage.
All the footage was wiped from the mainframe.
Yeah, 'cause it's an inside job.
Mademoiselle Joubert, we'll need your phone for a vocal analysis of the voice mail.
translation.de: Mademoiselle, wir müssen die Sprachnachricht analysieren.

translation.en: Of course. Anything you need.
They're professional, no doubt. They were concise and brief on the phone.
translation.de: -Was immer Sie brauchen. -Es sind Profis. Ihr Telefonat war kurz und knapp.

translation.en: We also have reason to believe that the inside man was posing as an elephant handler.
translation.de: Wir glauben, dass der Insider sich als Elefantenführer ausgab.

translation.en: You really wanna do suspects now, Mrs. Spitz?
-Sure. -[Miller] Fine. How about this? Uh…
A husband and wife, one an NYPD almost-detective,
translation.de: Ein Ehepaar. Er Möchtegern-Detective des NYPD, sie Friseurin, die Online-Kurse nimmt.

translation.en: the other a hairdresser taking online classes.
translation.de: Er Möchtegern-Detective des NYPD, sie Friseurin, die Online-Kurse nimmt.

translation.en: Together they run a private detective agency teetering on the edge of bankruptcy.
translation.de: Sie betreiben eine Detektei, die kurz vorm Bankrott steht.

translation.en: And if I were to hazard a guess, I'd say it's probably taking a toll on their marriage.
translation.de: Ich wage zu vermuten, dass es ihre Ehe belastet.

translation.en: Desperate to give validity to their failing business,
translation.de: Um ihre gescheiterte Firma zu retten,

translation.en: they accept a last-minute invite from a billionaire to attend his wedding.
translation.de: akzeptieren sie die Hochzeitseinladung eines Milliardärs.

translation.en: And so a plan is born.
Twenty-four hours after their arrival, there's a high-profile kidnapping,
translation.de: 24 Stunden nach ihrer Ankunft gibt es eine Entführung,

translation.en: the sort that gets attention. A career maker.
How's my reasoning, fellow… detectives?
-Pretty excellent. None of it was true. -Gorgeous.
I was starting to go with it 'cause of the way you phrase things.
translation.de: Unwahr, aber sehr schön formuliert. -Ich glaubte es fast. -Der Akzent hilft.

translation.en: -I almost believed him. -The accent helps.
Call trace is ready. Kidnappers should be calling in any minute.
translation.de: Rufverfolgung bereit. Die Entführer rufen bald an.

translation.en: If you'll excuse me, I have a job to do.
-Okay, so listen. -[Audrey] Yes, honey.
We got good cheese. We got free iPhones. I'm happy with everything.
translation.de: Es gab guten Käse und iPhones. Ich bin zufrieden.

translation.en: Where are you going? Did you hear what that guy just said about us?
translation.de: Wohin gehst du? Hast du gehört, was er gesagt hat?

translation.en: -[Nick] Yeah. -None of that's true!
We need to show those people what Nick and Audrey Spitz are all about.
translation.de: Wir müssen zeigen, wer Nick und Audrey sind.

translation.en: The guy's good! I don't think he needs us.
-Nick. Audrey. -[both] What?
The kidnapper says he'll only talk to the man he shot at.
translation.de: Der Entführer will mit dem reden, auf den er schoss.

translation.en: They need us. All right. They need us.
-Let's go! -Let's go!
-[machines beeping] -[Colonel] They're here.
-[Miller] He's calling back in a minute. -Okay.
You need to keep him calm, keep him talking.
-We need at least-- -Forty-five seconds.
-I know. It's not my first rodeo, pal. -You've done hostage negotiation?
I'm married to this lady. Everything's a negotiation. I got it.
translation.de: Mit meiner Frau verhandle ich ständig. Ich kriege das hin, danke.

translation.en: Appreciate it.
So 45 seconds, and it starts… now.
translation.de: Also: 45 Sekunden. Und die laufen ab jetzt.

translation.en: Hi. Kidnapper, how are you?
[kidnapper] Is this the man who tried to stop me on my escape?
translation.de: Sind Sie der Mann, der mich aufhalten wollte?

translation.en: Yes, yes, yes, the man you shot at.
translation.de: Ja, Sie haben auf mich geschossen.

translation.en: Luckily, I got out of the way. [chuckles]
Tell me what we can do to get Vik back safely.
translation.de: Was sollen wir tun, um Vik zurückzubekommen?

translation.en: That's all we really care about.
[kidnapper] For the return of the Maharajah, we require $50 million.

translation.en: It must have smeared in tonight's commotion.
Oh, thank God. I'm sick. I can't take one more accident tonight.
translation.de: Gott sei Dank. Ich ertrage keine Unfälle mehr.

translation.en: No more blood, please.
-I swear, I thought it was blood. -I am exhausted. Aren't you?
[Vik] Yeah.
-What are you muttering about right now? -Something doesn't make sense.
I'm sorry. It just doesn't make any sense.
Saira, I'm so sorry. What…
Did you just say you smeared your henna during tonight's commotion?
translation.de: Du sagtest, das Henna wäre im Tumult verschmiert?

translation.en: That's right.
That's interesting.
[scoffs] Why is that interesting?
[Nick] Yes, why is that interesting?
You know, I never saw you during the welcome dance.
translation.de: Ich habe dich beim Willkommenstanz nicht gesehen.

translation.en: And then you just kind of showed up right after the elephant arrived.
translation.de: Du warst plötzlich da, nachdem der Elefant kam.

translation.en: Yeah. I was… I was getting a drink. [laughs]
translation.de: Ja. Ich hatte mir einen Drink geholt.

translation.en: Honey, I was a hairdresser, and I know a thing or two about dyes,
translation.de: Ich war Friseurin und kenne mich mit Färbemitteln aus.

translation.en: and once henna sets, it doesn't smear.
translation.de: Wenn Henna getrocknet ist, verschmiert es nicht.

translation.en: Sorry. I… I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.de: Sorry, ich habe keine Ahnung, wovon du redest.

translation.en: That wasn't blood that I saw on the elephant handler's robe.
translation.de: Das war kein Blut auf der Robe des Elefantenführers.

translation.en: It was henna.
And it was your henna that never had time to dry the night of the murder.
translation.de: Dein Henna hatte in der Mordnacht keine Zeit zu trocknen.

translation.en: Oh my God! The sister did it!
translation.de: Oh mein Gott! Es war die Schwester!

translation.en: Oh snap!
Come on. This is lunacy! You guys, haven't we done this already?
translation.de: So ein Irrsinn. Hatten wir das nicht schon?

translation.en: I love my brother. I mean, what reason would I have to--
translation.de: Ich liebe meinen Bruder. Warum sollte ich?

translation.en: Maybe because your parents gave him the family business,
translation.de: Weil deine Eltern ihm das Familienunternehmen gaben,

translation.en: even though you're the smart one,
and he's the Jet Skiing rapper wannabe with no skill at all?
No offense. Some taken.
And isn't that the same reason you tried to kill him in Mumbai?
translation.de: Darum wolltest du ihn schon in Mumbai umbringen.

translation.en: You!
Well, my parents were right about one thing.
translation.de: Bei einem hatten meine Eltern recht.

translation.en: If you need something done correctly, you should just do it yourself.
translation.de: Wenn etwas richtig gemacht werden soll, sollte man es selbst machen.

translation.en: -[Vik] Saira! -[Audrey gasps]
[Colonel] No!
Oh! This poor guy, honey! He's running out of arms!
translation.de: Der arme Kerl! Ihm gehen die Arme aus!

translation.en: Not in my town. Yeah! That's my bae!
translation.de: -Nicht in meiner Stadt. -Ja! Das ist mein Schatz!

translation.en: [sighs] Thank you, baby. I've got to just…
-'Sup! It's okay. Yeah. -[Colonel groans]
You… You did great, pal. You're my number one bodyguard.
translation.de: Toll, Kumpel. Sie sind mein oberster Leibwächter.

translation.en: And not just 'cause the last one got smoked.
translation.de: Nicht nur, weil der letzte tot ist.

translation.en: That Kwanzaa bonus better be off the hook this year.
translation.de: Ich will dieses Jahr einen fetten Kwanzaa-Bonus.

translation.en: Hey, it's bionic arm time, bitch! Yeah?
translation.de: Zeit für einen bionischen Arm, Alter! -Ja? -Ja!

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah!
-How are you feeling, young man? -How are you doing?
-I'm okay. -Laurent is a special man. Aren't you?
We're gonna go to dinner once you get out of the hospital.
translation.de: Wir gehen essen, wenn du geheilt bist.

translation.en: Paris weaves its spell once again.
translation.de: Das ist der Zauber von Paris.

translation.en: Feel better.
-All right. -[Vik] Should we tell them?
-Yes! [laughs] -Okay, guys. We decided to elope.
-That is the smart choice, always. -That's amazing.
translation.de: Immer eine kluge Wahl. -Fantastisch. -Schön für euch.

translation.en: Good for you guys.
Yeah, no family, but, um, I owe you guys my life.
translation.de: Wir sind nicht verwandt, aber ich schulde euch mein Leben.

translation.en: Oh, we're just happy you're both okay.
translation.de: Wir sind froh, dass es euch gut geht.

translation.en: And really, honestly, thank you for giving us an adventure…
Yes. …we are never going to forget.
-Oh. -Yep.
translation.de: Oh, dann sind wir quitt. Bis dann.

translation.en: -I guess we're even then. Peace out. -Peace out!
translation.de: Oh, dann sind wir quitt. Bis dann. Bis dann!

translation.en: -Bye-bye. -Au revoir!
Sorry about your sister being a psycho, by the way.
translation.de: Tut mir leid um deine Schwester.

translation.en: Ah, don't worry about it. She's a real piece of shit.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Sie ist ein Dreckstück.

translation.en: -Yes, she was. -[both] Yeah.
-[Nick] Okay. -Honey, I'm really ready to go home.
-Yes, I am too. -I'm really ready.
We have to do one thing first.
translation.de: Aber eins müssen wir noch tun.

translation.en: -Trust me. Trust me. All right? -What? Okay. Okay. Okay.
-[Nick] Check on the Colonel. You okay? -[Audrey] Colonel!
translation.de: Sehen wir nach dem Colonel. Alles ok?

translation.en: You're not losing this arm?
[Nick] Click it. Click it. We did it.
Now we are forever locked up together for the rest of our lives.
translation.de: Jetzt sind wir auf ewig aneinander gekettet.

translation.en: I'd never wanna be locked up with anybody else.
translation.de: Das will ich mit keinem anderen.

translation.en: Me neither, sweetheart. You are--
translation.de: Ich auch nicht, Schatz. Du bist…

translation.en: -[man] The Shitz! -What?
[chuckles] Nick and Audrey Shitz!
-The helicopter guy? What the-- -What are you doing here?
Take it. Take the phone!
Hello?
[Vik] Of course we're not even. Take my helicopter!
translation.de: Wir sind nicht quitt. Fliegt mit meinem Hubschrauber in die Flitterwochen!

translation.en: Go anywhere! Have a honeymoon you deserve! And a little cash!
translation.de: Fliegt mit meinem Hubschrauber in die Flitterwochen! Mit etwas Geld!

translation.en: -What? -Cash? A bag of--
-Are you for real? -[Nick laughs]
-Oh my gosh. Look! Oh my-- -Well, yeah.
translation.de: Oh mein Gott, schau! Ja, das scheint genug Geld zu sein. Danke.

translation.en: That seems to be enough money. Thank you.
translation.de: Ja, das scheint genug Geld zu sein. Danke.

translation.en: [Vik] Just ten million! Don't spend it all in one place!
translation.de: Zehn Millionen. Gebt es nicht auf einmal aus, aber wenn doch,

translation.en: But if you do spend it all,
translation.de: Gebt es nicht auf einmal aus, aber wenn doch,

translation.en: just sell the briefcase.
It's worth three million!
-It's dinosaur leather! -My God!
Dinosaur? We can't take this! Come on!
You know what? We will take this. Thank you.
[Vik] Now you two keep busting nuts! Maharajah out!
What's the first thing you wanna do?
-I wanna kiss you! -Ah!
I can't believe this!
-My baby. -My darling.
The honeymoon we always deserved.
-Exactly. -Finally.
Can you believe how lucky we are?
translation.de: Kaum zu fassen. Was für ein Glück!

translation.en: [American accent] You liking those drinks?
-What-- -Are you shitz-ing us right now?
Hand me the bag.
What? The, uh--
-Bag. Hand me the bag. -You want this?
translation.de: Geben Sie mir die Tasche. -Die hier? -Gib sie ihm.

translation.en: -That's not a problem. -Give him the bag.
[Nick] What happened to the accent?
It's back in Jersey.
Let's just have a civilized conversation.
[pilot] See you never, Shitzes!
-Oh my God! Where did he-- -Oh my God! Oh-- Oh my--
